channel.title: A problem that isnt solved yet D:
channel.description:
plz ive been searching already 5-6 days for it and still didnt found anything to fix the js5connect error :( plz anyone help me D: im not using it for online so i dont portforward and using localhost ip and the sub revisoins are the same :(
plz anyone know how to solve my js5connect problem? :(

item.title: A problem that isnt solved yet D:
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

make sure all the ips are set to localhost on the client. sometimes you need to run the server before you run the client too. also it be that you need to change the ports so they match/compile. hope i helped
